__e: She figures if anybody knows where Gabriel is, it's her.
the only reason i'm alive is because a part of gabriel is buried deep inside of you, enough to make you think you want to win me back, enough to make you think you can.
And it's not him that I am worried about.
But the truth is, Gabriel is not my problem now.
But he's dead and Gabriel doesn't care.
Gabriel doesn't like to talk about it, sir, but the truth is he did it for love.
Could that be why Gabe is here ?
Gabriel is a unique opportunity, the first chance I've had to interface with one of my own...
Right, so... the thought of doing this again with somebody who didn't know Gabriel just...
- I do not know Gabriel, I think there is 8.
Gabe, I am here to help you you don't have to be afraid to talk to me
But... but you were sitting there talking about Gabriel, and I realized...
I do, and then my mind starts wandering into all that stuff with Gabriel and then I don't.
Just that his name's Gabriel and he was some random dude.

The thing is this... this vision, it was like... I think it's something that happened to the ghost... gabriel's mother... and I, you know, at first, I thought it maybe was the moment that they took her to the hospital, but that wasn't right.
Is she really thinking of killing Gabriel's daughter out of revenge?
I bought this for my mother's birthday. It's meant to be a guardian angel. But my boss said it's St. Gabriel.
Gabriel, why... if you're just using me, why--Why come back?
